Author: herdofthebay
Text: I ended up eating a packet of Splenda and going to sleep. Usually I can’t compromise and MUST have what I wanted, so I would have driven in the rain to get the candy but I was too tired and settled for a packet of ‘sugar’. at least it got me to sleep.  Love your reply, it makes me feel.. not so silly or alone lol

Author: hammerprice
Text: This is legit, it's anxiety caused by food insecurity and I get it HARDCORE. If food plans change at the last second and I don't have a viable alternative, or if I can't find something that I had my heart set on, my face will literally go numb with panic lol.  I really hope you found it or at the very least had a pleasant night's sleep. Don't feel crazy for feeling this way, it's human nature & survival instinct to be protective of your food stores. It doesn't matter if we've evolved to the point of pink starbursts, that was YOUR meal!!
